member.summary:
Returns recommendations targeted towards optimizing specific conversion.
This method returns list of next best journey steps as recommendations. Since those step represent a journey please use the first recommendation. The next recommendations are generated in case the first choice cannot be displayed (for example the first recommended content item was deleted).
member.param: The conversion id of the of the conversion which is being optimized.
member.returns: List of recommendations.
